alfredsnippet.snippet:
folder_name="{clipboard}"
file_name=$(basename "$folder_name")
dir=$(dirname "$folder_name")
dir_concat="${dir}/${file_name}/concat.txt"
rm -f "$dir_concat"

while IFS= read -r -d $'\0' file; do
    if [[ "$file" != "${dir}/${file_name}/.DS_Store" && "$file" != *.txt ]]; then
        echo "file '$file'" >> "$dir_concat"
    fi
done < <(find "$folder_name" -type f -print0 | sort -z -V)

output_file="${dir}/${file_name}_merged.mp4"
ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i "$dir_concat" -c copy "$output_file"


## PC
$folderPath = "{clipboard}"
$fileName = Split-Path -Leaf $folderPath
$dir = Split-Path -Parent $folderPath

$concatFilePath = Join-Path $dir "$fileName/concat.txt"
$outputFilePath = Join-Path $dir "${fileName}_merged.mp4"

Remove-Item $concatFilePath -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

Get-ChildItem -Path $folderPath -File -Recurse | Where-Object { $_.Name -ne ".DS_Store" -and $_.Extension -ne ".txt" } | ForEach-Object {
    Add-Content $concatFilePath "file '$($_.FullName)'"
}

ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i $concatFilePath -c copy $outputFilePath
alfredsnippet.name: VideoCut - merge video in folder
